silk evening tunic.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Robin Wise 3 [mailto:eurmali@...]

Subject: [eqbards] Red Dragonscale Armor

From: "Robin Wise 3" <eurmali@...>

> Date: Fri, 29 Oct 1999 15:50:36 -0600

>Subject: RE: New goodies from Kedge Keep and other places
****SP OILER****
>
>The Dragonscale armor sounded sweet as well - I saw that it
was quest
>obtained and my jaw nearly dropped from my skull.
Unfortunately, it
>requires an item that I have a snowballs chance in hell of
getting and I
>have no idea what the Vial of Swirling Mist is, or where it
comes from?
>Any ideas?

If I remember correctly, the Vial of Swirling Smoke is the
famous Gate
Potion, sold in Kelethin for the reasonable and economically
feasible price
of 1000pp, give or take a hundred. = ) I believe it is also
sold elsewhere
(East Freeport?) but I do recall seeing it in Kelethin.
Sooo to get this
armor all you need is roughly 2000pp... oh, and you have to
kill Nagafen.
Sign me up!

Aloro Silvertongue (E'ci)
